node.html: Personal portfolio website hosted on GitHub Pages inspired by Brittany Chiang's V4 template

This is a simple face recognition system implemented using the OpenCV library in Python. The project involves capturing and saving face images, training a face recognition model, and performing recognition tasks.

A fully functional and responsive image gallery that showcases a collection of images in a visually appealing way. Ability to Login to the gallery page. Authenticated users are able to use the Drag-and-Drop feature, able to select and drag images, effortlessly rearranging them within the gallery. This project consumes data from the unSplash API.
An image generator app using ReactJS, inspired by DALL-E, to create unique images based on text prompts. Explore endless creative possibilities with advanced AI-driven image generation.

frontmatter.title: Tic Tac Toe - Java CLI App

node.html: This is a simple console-based Tic Tac Toe game implemented in Java. The game allows two players to take turns entering their moves until one of them wins or the board is full.
Dictionary App is a Chrome extension that provides quick and easy access to word definitions and synonyms. Enhance your vocabulary and understanding directly within your browser.
This is my minimalist personal portfolio website.

This project is a simple clone of a chat application powered by OpenAI's GPT-3.5. It allows users to interact with an AI-powered chatbot. This Project is built using React to create a user-friendly chat interface. It utilizes the OpenAI GPT-3.5 model to generate responses based on user input.
This is a frontend-only web application that replicates some of the core features of Spotify. It is built using React and utilizes the Spotify API for fetching music data.
QuickNote is a Chrome extension designed for fast and easy note-taking directly within your browser. Capture ideas, to-dos, and important information seamlessly while you browse
